mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: McWhistes, H. C.; Starr, William C.; Spencer
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Adjt Genl Samuels Wheeling Nov 25 1861. By Telegraph from Romney 25 1861. Capt Spencer & Company wants to be mustered into the tenth are there any hindrances answer by telegraph HC McWhistes Lieut Spencer Co A & WC Starr Col 10th Va 25Hm110pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: McWhistes, H. C.; Starr, William C.; Spencer
Pomeroy, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Samuels, Henry Jefferson
